room_title: Escape room "Code Blue" by Coral Springs Escape Rooms in Miami
room_description:
You and your friends are out exploring the Everglades. Deep inside the swamps, you hear somebody screaming for help. All of a sudden you see a man running towards you. He collapses in pain inches from your feet. With his last ounce of strength, he tells you that a venomous snake attacked him and he has 60 minutes before the poison kills him. His last words to you are: I Believe In You!
To save him, you must recover the antidote from the closest emergency room. When you get there, however, the receptionist has bad news: the only doctor was called to help with another emergency. Youâ€™re on your own!
